pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a high-angle, time-lapse shot of the Palais Royal - Musée du Louvre metro station in Paris. The scene captures the station's distinctive arched architecture, with white tiled walls and platforms flanking the tracks. The video shows a train departing and the blurred motion of commuters on the platforms.
